 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטַר‎</span>] **verb** ==keep== (less common \|\| of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַר‎</span>) (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְטַר‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Nabataean in proper name [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>323</sup> (compare also below), Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.*** (object garden, etc.)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטָ֑רְתִּי‎</span> [[Song.1.6|Song 1:6]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִטּוֺר‎</span> [[Ps.103.9|Ps 103:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנְטוֺר‎</span> [[Jer.3.5|Jer 3:5]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּטֹּר‎</span> also [[Amos.1.11|Amos 1:11]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִטְרֹף‎</span>) [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>Ps 103:9</sup> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּטִּר‎</span> [[Lev.19.18|Lev 19:18]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶטּוֺר‎</span> [[Jer.3.12|Jer 3:12]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺטֵר‎</span> [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹטֵרָה‎</span> [[Song.1.6|Song 1:6]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹטְרִים‎</span> [[Song.8.11|Song 8:11]]; [[Song.8.12|Song 8:12]] — 

**1.** ***keep, maintain*** (that is, wrath), of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Jer.3.5|Jer 3:5]]; [[Jer.3.12|Jer 3:12]]; [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> ***for***), [[Ps.103.9|Ps 103:9]] of Edom [[Amos.1.11|Amos 1:11]] (reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּטֹּר לָעַד אַפּוֺ‎</span> ***and he kept his anger perpetually***, see above). 

**2.** ***keep, guard*** a vineyard [[Song.1.6|Song 1:6]]; [[Song.1.6|Song 1:6]] (in figurative), absolute [[Song.8.11|Song 8:11]], object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּרְיוֺ‎</span> v[[Song.8.12|Song 8:12]].
